document_data.name: Brownfin
document_data.diet: Carnivore{{cite web| url = http://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_080910-04.htm| title =  So Saith Ed Aug-Oct 2004| accessdate = 14-4-2020| date = 14-4-2020}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Brownfin''' was a species of freshwater [[fish]] found in streams and rivers of [[Cormyr]], the [[King's Forest]], and in the cold waters of [[Dathyl]].
document_data.Ecology: Brownfins were carnivorous creatures like the majority of fish. Brownfins were bigger than [[minnow]]s, which they consumed, while river [[eel]]s were bigger than brownfins and consumed them in turn.
document_data.History: In [[1348 DR]], delicious roasted brownfin fish were a part of [[Florin Falconhand]]'s and [[Narantha Crownsilver]]'s morningfeast along with roasted [[rabbit]] and fresh [[cavanter]] buds.
